codePut:
declare
l_status_ind spraddr.spraddr_status_ind%TYPE; 
l_atype_code VARCHAR2(30);

begin
select nvl(to_char(gurocfg_value), 'PR') as address_type
into l_atype_code
from gurocfg
where gurocfg_name = 'aip.home.address.type';

gb_address.p_update(
    p_pidm             => :parm_user_pidm,
    p_atyp_code        => l_atype_code,
    p_seqno            => :SPRADDR_SEQNO,
    p_street_line1     => :SPRADDR_STREET_LINE1,
    p_street_line2     => :SPRADDR_STREET_LINE2,
    p_city             => :SPRADDR_CITY,
    p_zip              => :SPRADDR_ZIP,
    p_natn_code        => :SPRADDR_NATN_CODE,
    p_status_ind       => l_status_ind);
end;
codeGet:
select spraddr_pidm, spraddr_atyp_code, spraddr_seqno, spraddr_status_ind, spraddr_street_line1, spraddr_street_line2, spraddr_city, spraddr_zip, spraddr_natn_code, spraddr_surrogate_id as ID
from spraddr a1
where a1.spraddr_pidm = :parm_user_pidm
and a1.spraddr_atyp_code = (select nvl(to_char(gurocfg_value), 'PR') as address_type
                            from gurocfg
                            where gurocfg_name = 'aip.home.address.type')
and a1.spraddr_seqno = (select max(a2.spraddr_seqno) 
                        from spraddr a2 
                        where a2.spraddr_pidm = a1.spraddr_pidm
                        and a2.spraddr_atyp_code = (select nvl(to_char(gurocfg_value), 'PR') as address_type
                        from gurocfg
                        where gurocfg_name = 'aip.home.address.type')
                        and spraddr_to_date is  null
                        and a2.spraddr_status_ind is null)
codePost:
declare 
l_seqno_inout  spraddr.spraddr_seqno%TYPE;
l_atype_code VARCHAR2(30);
l_rowid_out rowid;

begin
select nvl(to_char(gurocfg_value), 'PR') as address_type
into l_atype_code
from gurocfg
where gurocfg_name = 'aip.home.address.type';
gb_address.p_create(
    p_pidm             => :parm_user_pidm,
    p_atyp_code        => l_atype_code,
    p_seqno_inout      => l_seqno_inout,
    p_street_line1     => :SPRADDR_STREET_LINE1,
    p_street_line2     => :SPRADDR_STREET_LINE2,
    p_city             => :SPRADDR_CITY,
    p_zip              => :SPRADDR_ZIP,
    p_natn_code        => :SPRADDR_NATN_CODE,
    p_from_date        => SYSDATE,
    p_rowid_out        => l_rowid_out);
end;
